title: Yasuo's Truth.
body: after an entire 2 years of yasuo getting picked or banned in more than HALF of ranked games riot is finaly addressing the issue and yasuo mains are going mad.

replies.body: You would be to, if your main was at approx 50% winrate, and was nerfed because the lowest ranked players refuse to learn how to play against him.
